metadata.synopsis: One liner for the Lovers in the Park.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to either of the Lovers in the LOW Park at ~ -105, 31, -37

0.speaker: Wendel Ashgrove
0.text: I do hope the Fist take a step back from the park soon, then it'd be the perfect spot for me and my Eugenie.

1.speaker: Wendel Ashgrove
1.text: Right here, just one month ago, my Eugenie agreed to our courtship. It's a good place for romance, take it from me!

3.speaker: Wendel Ashgrove
3.text: Though I must admit - all the clankery from the Flaming Fists dampens the mood somewhat.

2.speaker: Wendel Ashgrove
2.text: I can't believe it... I do hope all that horribleness doesn't tar the memory of this place. It's usually so lovely.
